text: Erich Mendelsohn (born 21 March 1887 - 15 September 1953) was a German architect born in Allenstein, Prussia. He is known for his expressionist architecture and also his work on the Art Deco and Streamline Moderne designs. == References == Category:1887 births Category:1953 deaths Category:German architects Category:German Jews Category:Prussian writers
title: Erich Mendelsohn
